answers.answer: Congrats! and yes you'll need the carseat, good luck :D
Yu can just have yer husband bring the car seat up when yer getting released :)
Congratulations!!! And good luck to you!
I wish I could be induced... I'm 37 weeks 3 days and sooooooooo sick all the time. I'm so impatient I could cry

Thanks everyone. I had forgot to ask the midwife I saw at my last appointment. my baby's father and I broke up in February and didn't want anything to do with the baby. my mom and sister will be there with me.
I was induced with my third and it wasn't any more painful than going into labor naturally. Good luck!!!

How exciting!!! Yes bring all two bags and just have the carseat strapped up and ready in the car your going home in. :0) I wish you a smooth safe delivery and healthy little one!!! I bet your going to have a hard time sleeping tonight with all the built up excitement! Everything will work out I was induced and it was horrible but my son was 2 weeks early(preeclampsia) and wasnt ready. Just remember every mom,labor, and actual delivery is different. Just cause Others had a bad experience doesnt mean you will. :0)
Thanks! I don't really sleep much during the night already. I will be happy when its done and over with and I have my son in my arms.
Oh my apologies...yu can have whoever bring the carseat up

question: Well tomorrow I go in to be induced.I'm excited to meet my lil man but scared because I keep hearing its more painful when induced. when u go in do u jst take ur bag and the baby's bag? Or do I need to take the car seat in too?
title: tomorrow
